alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 7:45PM CST until March 09 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Friday the stage was 26.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage around sunrise tomorrow morning to a crest of 34.0 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 26.8 Fri 6 pm CST 32.3 34.0 33.7 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
